message: This topic is for attendees to ask questions of the volunteers (organizers are also just volunteers). For providing specific feedback and reporting issues please use the Feedback for organizers group: https://convore.com/pycon-2011/feedback-for-the-organizers/
Six cups of coffee or seven cups of coffee, what does it really take?

There's an official PyCon guide on it.
